page.title: 04A day at school 1
page.content:
School starts at 8.55 when a bell rings to tell us to take our coats and bags in and report to our classrooms.
Mr Peach takes the{register}and collects the dinner money and then another bell tells us that it is time for{assembly.} We have an assembly every morning. Usually we have a story, sing some hymns and say a few prayers.
After assembly, which the whole school attends, we return to our classrooms and{lessons}begin. In the morning we usually do language work and maths. We work on our own or in groups. My favourite lesson is maths, but a lot of the other children don't like it much.
